name: Mister Boppo
description:
Took the Miller Boppo from Trumpty Dumpty POTUS Pinball, and made a simple Boxing Game from it.

Basically, the Player is in a Boxing Ring as either a Peaceful Alien, Sweet Kitten, or Special Censored Character who all simply smack or scratch the Spawning Miller Boppos for Points. That's it!

------------------------------------------

in Version v.051, the Player plays only as the Alien.

Next update will allow the Player access to the Kitty character after so many points. Ths Censored Character will be a tbd Unlock.

Updates will come on no predetermined schedule, as this project is a creator's diversion project. If anyone would like to  see it developed further, please let me know!
